casebody.data:
CAMPBELL
v.
INGRAM & McLaurin. No. 636A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2007. William P. Floyd, Jr., for Campbell. Robert A. Hasty, Jr., Spring, TX, for McLaurin. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 636 S.E.2d 847 . The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of March 2007 by Defendant (Ingram) to Withdraw Appeal: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
